author: The Linux Foundation
description:
‼️ 🤖 모두가 AI에 대해 이야기하지만, 사실은 이렇습니다! AI는 클라우드 네이티브 엔지니어가 있기에 가능합니다. 인프라가 없으면 모델도 없고, 클러스터가 없으면 추론도 없고, 보안이 없으면 확장도 없습니다.

2026년에 진정한 커리어 레버리지를 원한다면, AI를 구동하는 기술부터 시작해야 합니다. Cyber ​​Week에서는 이러한 기술들을 쉽게 활용할 수 있습니다.
🔸 자격증 + THRIVE-ONE 연간 구독 65% 할인
🔸 일부 번들 60% 할인
🔸 Kubestronaut 번들 50% 할인
🔸 개별 자격증, 이러닝, ILT 50% 할인
🔸 THRIVE-ONE 30% 할인

Phippy가 초안 작성 중입니다. 지금이 바로 시작할 때입니다.
스택을 시작하세요: https://hubs.la/Q03V4RL70

✳️ 보너스! 2026년 강좌 및 자격증 취득에 사용할 수 있는 100달러 상품권을 받으세요!

title: 훈조는 사이버 위크가 쿠버네티스 자격증을 취득하기에 가장 좋은 시기라고 말합니다!

author: The Linux Foundation
description:
‼️ 🤖 Everyone’s talking about AI, but here’s the truth! AI only works because cloud native engineers do. No infrastructure → no models. No clusters → no inference. No security → no scale.

If you want real career leverage in 2026, it starts with the skills that power AI under the hood. Cyber Week makes it easy to stack them:
🔸 65% off Certification + THRIVE-ONE Annual Subscription
🔸 60% off select bundles
🔸 50% off Kubestronaut bundles
🔸 50% off individual certs, e-learning, and ILT
🔸 30% off THRIVE-ONE

Phippy’s at the drafting table — now’s the time to build.
Start your stack: https://hubs.la/Q03V4RL70

✳️ BONUS! Get a US$100 gift voucher to use for courses & certifications in 2026!

title: Hoon Jo says Cyber Week is the best time to get your Kubernetes certification!

author: The Linux Foundation
description:
👨‍🚀 As Artem Lajko says, Kubestronauts don't wait for perfect conditions — they launch when the window opens. And Cyber Week is your launch window!

Save 50% on every Kubestronaut and Golden Kubestronaut bundle, including upgrade paths for CKA and CKAD holders. If you're ready to level up your Kubernetes skills, earn high-credibility credentials, and stand out for platform engineering and cloud native roles, this week delivers your best chance of the year.

title: Artem Lajko says, Kubestronauts don't wait — they launch when the Cyber Week window opens.

author: The Linux Foundation
description:
👨‍🚀 Wie Artem Lajko sagt, Kubestronauten warten nicht auf perfekte Bedingungen – sie starten durch, sobald sich die Gelegenheit bietet. Und die Cyber ​​Week ist Ihre Chance!

Sparen Sie 50 % auf alle Kubestronaut- und Golden-Kubestronaut-Pakete, inklusive Upgrade-Optionen für CKA- und CKAD-Inhaber. Sind Sie bereit, Ihre Kubernetes-Kenntnisse auf die nächste Stufe zu heben, hoch angesehene Zertifizierungen zu erwerben und sich für Positionen im Bereich Platform Engineering und Cloud Native zu profilieren? Dann bietet Ihnen diese Woche die beste Gelegenheit des Jahres.

🚀 5 Kubestronaut-/Golden-Kubestronaut-Pakete zur Auswahl.
🚀 Alle 50 % reduziert!
🚀 Angebot gültig bis 9. Dezember.

Starten Sie jetzt Ihren Aufstieg: https://hubs.la/Q03V4RL70 

✳️ BONUS! Erhalten Sie einen Geschenkgutschein im Wert von 100 US-Dollar, den Sie im Jahr 2026 für Kurse und Zertifizierungen einlösen können!
